full_text: I don't brag about business tools often, but when I do, I'm probably talking about Navan. Navan automates expenses from swipe to reconciliation. I added our spend policy once, and now our employees just upload a photo of the receipt and then it gets automatically approved or flagged for review. Before Navan we spent hours chasing after expenses, reports, approvals. Now it's off our plate. And, Navan syncs with most ERPs and accounting tools, so everything is aligned. For employees with corporate cards, Navan Connect links them to the platform, giving us more flexibility. All in all, introducing Navan to the company was probably my biggest win yet. Make it yours too. Get started on Navan.com.
